about: Acer Aspire 5 Gaming laptop is powered by the latest 12th Gen Intel Core i5 processor consisting of 12 cores for multitasking and productivity

RTX It's On : NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2050 - 4G-GDDR6 laptops deliver ray tracing and cutting-edge AI features. The RTX 2050 also works seamlessly with NVIDIA Optimus technology to give you the perfect balance between long battery life and optimum performance. Over 150 top games and applications use RTX to deliver realistic graphics or cutting-edge new AI features like NVIDIA DLSS and NVIDIA Broadcast. RTX is the new standard.

Enhanced Cooling : Experience engineered solutions to maximize cooling with dual fans supporting multiple cooling modes and dual copper thermal pipes. Expel up to 10% more heat with the air inlet keyboard to keep your cool when it counts.

Display Your Best : Get Full HD 15.6" IPS dispay with this gaming laptop under 65000. Boasting an 81.18% screen-to-body ratio and Acer Color Intelligence, and Acer BlueLightShield for dynamic color optimization and viewing comfort.

With Acer TNR Solution, experience intelligent image noise reduction in low-light conditions. Acer PurifiedVoice with AI noise reduction can actively suppress background noise for both users and is compatible with external headphones and mics, perfect for online courses or keeping in touch with family.

The Aspire 5 also features a 720P HD webcam and a fingerprint reader for convenient security.;Featuring the next generation in connectivity: Wi-Fi 6E, perfect for high-speed file sharing and smooth 4K streaming, and Bluetooth 5.2. And with a Thunderbolt 4 port, connect two 4K displays for multitasking. Featuring three USB Type-A ports and one HDMI 2.0.
Internal Specifications : 16 GB of DDR4 system memory upgradable up to 32 GB using two soDIMM modules and 512GB PCIe NVMe Gen 4 SSD

about: [Dual Noise Cancellation (ANC + ENC)] - The truke Buds Vibe ANC offers Dual Noise Cancellation with up to 35dB Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) and Quad Mic Environmental Noise Cancellation. With the ability to cancel up to 90% of ambient noises, these ear buds deliver a premium audio experience, no matter where you are. Enjoy your music or calls without any distractions, whether you're on a train, flight, in the office, or outdoors. The earbuds also come with a transparency mode to hear your surroundings clearly without taking off your earbuds or pausing the music. Simply tap and hold the right earbud for 2 seconds to switch between ANC On and Transparency Mode.

[Crystal-Clear Voice Calls] - With Quad MEMS mic technology, Truke Buds Vibe ANC ensures crystal-clear calls even in noisy environments. The four built-in microphones enhance voice pickup and suppress ambient noise during calls, ensuring superior call quality every time. Whether you're in a busy office, commuting, or just out and about, you can count on Truke Buds Vibe ANC to deliver superior call quality every time.

[13mm Big Speaker with 4 EQ Modes] - Truke buds vibe ANC feature 13mm titanium drivers for rich bass and immersive sound. With four preset EQ modes including balanced, dynamic, bass boost, and movie modes, you can personalize your listening experience, from balanced sound to powerful bass, to optimized audio for movies.

[48H Long Playtime with Fast Charging] : Get up to 48 hours of playtime with the 300mAh charging case, allowing you to explore your favorite playlist for days without worrying about constant charging. The lightning-fast charging technology lets you charge the case for just 10 minutes and enjoy music for up to 10 hours*.

[Ultimate Gaming Earbuds] : Truke Buds Vibe ANC offers a True Gaming Mode with ultra-low latency of up to 40ms, providing a near-perfect gaming experience. Tap the right earbud 3 times to enter Gaming Mode and enjoy uninterrupted gaming sessions. The fast and stable Bluetooth 5.3 connection ensures uninterrupted audio transmission during gameplay, while the secure and comfortable fit of the earbuds allows for extended gaming sessions without discomfort. The quad MEMS microphone setup provides clear and accurate voice pickup for in-game communication with teammates, and the low latency mode reduces lag and ensures smooth gameplay. All of these features make Truke Buds Vibe ideal for gaming.

[Instant Connectivity and Intuitive Controls] Truke Buds Vibe ANC earbuds feature Bluetooth 5.3 for secure, seamless, and energy-efficient connectivity with 2X faster and reliable connection. The advanced instant pairing technology ensures instant connection with the last paired device as soon as you open the case. Additionally, with high-quality touch panels, the earbuds offer intuitive control for answering calls, changing tracks, and accessing your preferred voice assistant with just a few taps.
[12-Month Warranty] : Truke Buds Vibe is backed by a 12-month warranty from the date of purchase, with coverage available at over 250 active service centers.

about: CUSTOMIZED FORMULATION: It treats Acanthosis Nigricans, a skin condition characterized by areas of dark, velvety discoloration in body folds and creases. It affects the body parts like back of neck, ankles, knuckles, armpits, thighs, elbows.
NON-GREASY FORMULATION: Helps to give a non-tacky feel and exfoliates the dark skin.
EVEN SKIN TONE & HYDRATION: It promotes even skin tone, softens the harder skin areas and keeps the skin hydrated for long duration.
KEY INGREDIENTS: Retinol, Lactic acid, Tea tree oil, Urea, Sweet almond oil.
DIRECTIONS FOR USE: Cleanse the skin and dry. Apply sufficient amount of Nigrifix cream only on the affected skin area and massage gently till it gets absorbed. For best results apply daily.

about: WOOD FURNITURE SHELF LINER, MULTI-USE: This wood self-adhesive furniture wallpaper is ideal to decorate or upgrade renovate old furniture, fridge/refrigerator, kitchen cabinets, drawers, bed, office table, wardrobe, desk, door, laminate or decorate even the walls of bedroom, living room, hall, study, office, restaurants, glass etc. Can be applied on smooth putty wall and tiles as well.
MATERIAL: PVC Vinyl ROLL SIZE: Large Size in cms: 45 x 300 cm [Need 7 Rolls to cover a 10 ft by 10 ft Wall Size.

SAFE & REMOVABLE: This wood decorative stickers wall paper is Removable, Waterproof, Heat resistant, Oil-resistant, Re-positionable and Eco-friendly. Wolpin wood wall decal is made with high quality eco and durable PVC film material. Accent the furniture in your house with this natural wood sicker. Our wallpaper will last for years without fading.
JUST PEEL & STICK: Quick & easy to apply! This wall paper can be applied to any smooth, clean and dry Surface. There are gridlines on the back for easy measurement and cutting.

CUSTOMER NOTE: If you wish to reposition the stickers after they have been applied on the walls; remove the stickers carefully to avoid any damage. The stickers can be reapplied, but its adhesive properties might be reduced. For newly painted walls, it’s suggested to wait for 4 weeks before applying the decal. DO NOT apply on wet walls.
It’s easy to remove or re-use and they don't leave sticky messes behind. Works great for crafts, bookcase, stands, nightstand, dresser drawer and other projects.
